thread.title: FlowMetric Life Sciences Names John M. Healey as President of FlowMetric Diagnostics and Executive Vice President of FlowMetric Life Sciences, Inc.

author: cnbc.com
title: FlowMetric Life Sciences Names John M. Healey as President of FlowMetric Diagnostics and Executive Vice President of FlowMetric Life Sciences, Inc.
text:
DOYLESTOWN, Pa.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- FlowMetric Life Sciences, Inc., is proud to announce that John M. Healey has joined the organization as the President of FlowMetric Diagnostics, Inc. and as the Executive Vice President of FlowMetric Life Sciences, Inc. In these roles, Mr. Healey will lead the global development and launch of a full suite of personalized health and wellness products as well as support the continued expansion of the contract research organization.
Renold Capocasale, Chairman & CEO of FlowMetric Life Sciences, said, “We are excited to have John join our leadership team and are confident that his experience in both Consumer Health Care and global business building will be an excellent asset for us.”
A proven global business executive, Mr. Healey joins FlowMetric Life Sciences from Sabert Corp., a privately-held entrepreneurial entity, where he led the organization to substantial revenue growth and profitability in his role as the President of the North American Division. Mr. Healey previously worked for over 20 years with Johnson & Johnson in leadership roles in Consumer Health Marketing, New Ventures, Strategic Planning, Operations and Mergers and Acquisitions, and finally as President of Consumer France, where he achieved record sales and profitability year over year.
“I was attracted to the mission of FlowMetric, where improving the health of patients and consumers is at the heart of everything we do. I look forward to joining the leadership team and helping FlowMetric continue its strong growth,” John added.
Mr. Healey is known as a transformational leader, who focuses on building great organizations and businesses by empowering employees, launching breakthrough innovation, building strong relationships with customers, creating scalable processes and programs, and incorporating operational excellence throughout the entity. John serves on many non-profit boards and graduated with an MBA from Duke University in 1992 and a Bachelor of Civil Engineering degree from Villanova University in 1985.
About FlowMetric Life Sciences™
The FlowMetric Life Sciences™ family of companies is driven to provide Flow Cytometry Solutions in Precision Medicine. FlowMetric and its European affiliate, FlowMetric Europe are leading Contract Research Organizations in the delivery of high-complexity, polychromatic flow cytometry and cell sorting services to the Global life sciences industry, with an uncompromising commitment to quality and innovation. FlowMetric Diagnostics is translating this expertise into advanced wellness solutions for a better life.
For more information visit: www.FlowMetric.com | Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn
